column4: Hey all, trying to use the 64-bit Java Plugin downloaded from Sun, but in the plugins directory there is only a folder called "desktop" with a PNG and one other file, no plugins at all, any ideas?
-:/usr/java/jre1.6.0_12/plugin$ ls -l ... desktop ...  ls -l desktop ... sun_java.desktop  sun_java.png
that's what I'm getting, just a stupid png and shortcut in a desktop folder, no plugins in the "plugin" directory within the extracted jre directory created by the run file
or is this ignore Belboz99 day?
